name: Helicopter Flight Pilot Sim
description:
Get ready to fly real helicopters in one of the best helicopter flying simulator experiences! Explore huge open-world scenery from the sky and ground below in a wide range of vehicles to fly and drive. From helicopters to airplanes, to cars to boats!
More than 50 vehicles are controllable.

Try out the all-new base jumping activities, go to high points in the world, jump-off with the exciting paraglider! Why not get to even higher heights in your helicopter and get the world record by jumping out and opening your parachute!

Play the ultimate flying, car and boat driving simulator right here!

Explore scenery and airports in high resolution with satellite maps, 3D buildings, runways, air traffic, weather conditions, and true volumetric clouds.
More than 150 km² of the area!

!!HFPS - Helicopter Flight Pilot Simulator is the ultimate helicopter flying simulation with 20 free levels!!

One of the best heli simulator games with dynamic weather conditions; fly through clear blue skies, tropical rain, snow, thunderstorms, wind, turbulence, and true 3d volumetric clouds!

Fly helicopters and planes across the huge open-world environment and explore its unique locations. Take off from multiple airports, commute from international airports to small campaign airports, and helipads spread throughout the world!
With tons of exciting points of interest to visit, from the air or the road, and even all new sea vehicles like boats and jetskis, you have the ultimate freedom to explore anywhere in the whole world!
Drive fast cars on the open roads, from 2x2 lanes to very small offroad road of mountains, with hill climb and canyon. Explore the world not just by flying, but with real car driving simulator experiences as well!

Take part in helicopter flight levels by walking into mission markers located throughout the world. Simply walk into the marker to begin the mission like any familiar open-world style gameplay.
Use the helpful minimap to know where are the missions spots. Expand to see the whole map by pressing on it. Fly across the open-world and explore for hours in one of the best airplane flying simulation games!

Action packed missions!:
- Random flight problems (landing gear problems, engine failure, etc.) to test real piloting situations
- Base jump from the top of mountains onto landing pads
- Transport very important passengers
- Clear the way for traffic from the sky with rocket
- Transport broken down vehicles to the scrapyard!
- Put out the fire with firefighter action!
- Stop criminals stealing aircraft in police vs robbers flying
- Emergency landing procedure in airplanes and helicopters
- Control your aircraft during a storm
- Race against helicopters, boats, and more!
- Do basejump from roof. Become a pro basejumper with your paraglider
- Fire rockets to remove all the objects and clear the road with your apache or supercobra

Features:
- Weather systems: clear sky, rain, thunderstorms, snow
- Day and night cycle
- True 3D volumetric cloud system
- Flight turbulence
- Realistic helicopter and plane flight physics
- All-new boat driving and watercraft experiences
- Intuitive flying controls: buttons, joystick, or accelerometers
- Vehicle crashes and smoke effects.
- Highly detailed realistic airplane cockpit environment.
- Huge selection of aircraft and airline
- Thrill-seeker's new base jumping activities!
- Miles of roads to drift and drive on and do stunt jumps

52 controllable vehicles:
- 15 helicopters, like Bell 206, Eurocopter EC135, Apache, Mil Mi-8, SuperCobra, Bell UH-1 Huey
- 18 aircrafts, like Cesna, Piper PA-46, Boeing 747, Airbus A380, F14, Hawk
- 10 boats, like Jetski, Yacht, Vedette, Offshore
- 9 cars, like SUV, 4x4, sport and racing car

The latest and one of the best challenging games. Become the ultimate Helicopter flight pilot in the all-new simulator gaming sensation, Helicopter Flight Pilot Simulator!
